Package Monitors

Class BettingCentre

  • java.lang.Object
    • Monitors.BettingCentre

  • public class BettingCentre
extends java.lang.Object
    The BettingCentre class is a monitor that contains all the necessary methods to be used in mutual exclusive access by the Broker and Spectator.

    This is where the Bets are handled.

    Since:
    2018-03-21
    See Also:
    Broker, Spectator

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BettingCentre​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void acceptTheBets​()
      Broker accepts a Bet, wakes next Spectator in line and waits for the next one until all Bets are taken.
      static boolean areThereAnyWinners​(int[] winnerList)
      Broker verifies if any Spectator won a Bet.
      static void goCollectTheGains​(int spectatorID)
      Called by a Spectator to collect the gain of after having won a Bet.
      static void honorBets​()
      Broker honors a Bet, wakes next Spectator in line and waits for the next Spectator claiming a reward until all rewards are given.
      static void placeABet​(int pid, double value, int horseID, double odds)
      Spectator waits in line, places a Bet and then wakes the Broker.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptTheBets

        public static void acceptTheBets​()
                          throws java.lang.IllegalMonitorStateException
        Broker accepts a Bet, wakes next Spectator in line and waits for the next one until all Bets are taken.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalMonitorStateException

      • areThereAnyWinners

        public static boolean areThereAnyWinners​(int[] winnerList)
        Broker verifies if any Spectator won a Bet.
        Parameters:
        winnerList - Integer array containing the ID of all the Horses who won.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if any Spectator won a Bet.

      • honorBets

        public static void honorBets​()
        Broker honors a Bet, wakes next Spectator in line and waits for the next Spectator claiming a reward until all rewards are given.

      • placeABet

        public static void placeABet​(int pid,
                             double value,
                             int horseID,
                             double odds)
        Spectator waits in line, places a Bet and then wakes the Broker.
        Parameters:
        pid - ID of the thread calling the method.
        value - Amount to bet.
        horseID - ID of the Horse in which to bet.
        odds - Odds of the Horse in which to bet.

      • goCollectTheGains

        public static void goCollectTheGains​(int spectatorID)
        Called by a Spectator to collect the gain of after having won a Bet.
        Parameters:
        spectatorID - ID of the thread calling the method.
